alert.note: Alert for Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 4:57PM CDT until June 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Texas, including the following county, Navarro. * WHEN...Until 700 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Corsicana, Kerens, Trinidad, Angus, Navarro, Lake Halbert, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Rice, Retreat, Mildred, Eureka, Goodlow, Powell, Emhouse, Roane and Chatfield.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
